description:
Young Arata is ready for his first day on the job at the Shinjuku ward office. But when he gets there, he finds that it involves talking to supernatural entities!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Angels and Tengu Above the Shinjuku Skyline
Anges et Tengus dans le ciel de Shinjuku
Shinjuku Joukuu no Tengu to Tenshi
新宿上空の天狗と天使
